summary: Ted Cassidy  was an American actor.
full_text: Theodore Crawford "Ted" Cassidy  was an American actor. Noted for his tall stature at 6 feet 9 inches ,  he tended to play unusual characters in offbeat or science-fiction series such as Star Trek and I Dream of Jeannie. He is perhaps best known for the role of Lurch on The Addams Family.
title: Ted Cassidy
